:S: Can Paint Shop Pro install on Ubuntu?
not that im aware, but check the wine appdb
i found adjusting to the GIMP as a PSP user easier than adjusting to Photo Shop
though i still wish it had left-click-to-dodge/right-click-to-burn like PSP8 did :P
it has separate toolbox windows, just like photoshop on a mac does, but the menus and such are less confusing (IMO) than photoshop and overall about the same complexity level as PSP
